Returns the winner at the end of a game, it should be called when the game is over.
Robot - Class in it.polimi.group06.domain
This class inherited from the Player class and it is used when a robot plays against a Human player .
Robot(int, String) - Constructor for class it.polimi.group06.domain.Robot
Constructor of Robot Player which calls the superclass constructor (Player) in order to initialize its objects, and sets the appropriate strategy of the AI class method

roundWinner(ArrayList<Card>, Suit, int) - Static method in class it.polimi.group06.domain.Rules
Returns the position (in case of just two players, 0 or 1) of the winner of the current round given the played cards at the end of a round, the current briscola and the position of the starting player
